column4: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=789578 but you might find it easier to just use a decent player (audacious, songbird ...)
be aware that there's no gui yet for setting system wide EQ..you have to guess values, re-login to check, correct them in the config-file , save, re-login.... takes some audio-engineer craftsmanship
i think ill just switch from music player
good idea... i think banshee will be the next default player in 9.10 any way
